name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ernest MORRISON, Appellant (two cases)

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ernest MORRISON, Appellant (two cases).

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lenard H. Sigal, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Marianne Cox, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
354 A.2d 249
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ernest MORRISON, Appellant (two cases).
Supretne Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 1976.
Lenard H. Sigal, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Marianne Cox, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
